fields.description:
When you display a badge on a DashboardItem (with a dashboardView),
the badge background is transparent whereas it should be red.

This does not happen with Ti SDK 6.0.4.GA.
fields.summary: iOS: Incorrect badge display on Ti.UI.DashboardView (no background image)
fields.environment:
Mac OS X  10.11.5
Titanium SDK 6.1.0.GA
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.8.1.201612050850
XCode 8.2.1

comments.body: Do you may use app-thinning and/or use an icon that may have the same name? We need a test-case and full environment anyway, thank you!

Hi Hans, 

I joined a test project with only dashboard inside.
